title: Bang Bang Baby
overview: 1986. Alice is a 16-year-old girl living in a small town in the North of Italy. Her life suddenly changes when she finds out her long-deceased father is still alive. Alice begins a descent into Milan's criminal underbelly, diving into the dangerous world of the â€˜ndrangheta out of love for her father. By the time she tries to get out of that world, it might already be too late.
